mapper.update: UPDATE ESERVICE.DBO.ROI_NOTIFICATION_JOB SET ENABLED = 'N',UPDATE_DATE = getdate() WHERE ENABLED = 'Y'
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ESERVICE.DBO.ROI_NOTIFICATION_JOB WHERE ENABLED = 'Y' ORDER BY POLICY_NO ASC, FUND_CODE ASC

SELECT
LISAFP.SAFP_INSU_NO as safp_insu_no, LISAFP.SAFP_NET_UNITS as safp_net_units, LISAFP.SAFP_NET_AMT as safp_net_amt, LISAFP.SAFP_AVG_PVAL as safp_avg_pval, LISAFP.SAFP_AVG_PNTDVAL as safp_avg_pntdval,
LIINVT.INVT_NO as invt_no, LIINVT.INVT_NAME as invt_name, LIINVT.INVT_EXCH_CURR as invt_exch_curr, LIINVT.INVT_RISK_BENE_LEVEL as invt_risk_bene_level, LIINVT.INVT_ST as invt_st, LIINVT.INVT_INVESTNO as invt_investno,
LIINWG.INWG_CODE as inwg_code, LIINWG.INWG_INVT_WEIGH as inwg_invt_weigh, LIINWG.INWG_REDEMP_ORDER as inwg_redemp_order FROM LISAFP@db51 LISAFP left join LIINVT@db51 LIINVT ON LISAFP.SAFP_INVT_NO = LIINVT.INVT_NO left join LIINWG@db51 LIINWG ON LISAFP.SAFP_INSU_NO = LIINWG.INWG_INSU_NO AND LISAFP.SAFP_INVT_NO = LIINWG.INWG_INVT_NO WHERE LISAFP.SAFP_INSU_NO = #{investmentVo.insuNo} AND LIINVT.INVT_NO = #{investmentVo.invtNo} ORDER BY LIINVT.INVT_NO, LIINWG.INWG_REDEMP_ORDER

SELECT ESERVICE.DBO.FN_DEBASE64(USS.EMAIL) EMAIL FROM ESERVICE.DBO.USERS USS JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM LIPM ON LIPM.LIPM_ID=USS.ROC_ID JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT POLICY_NO FROM ESERVICE.DBO.ROI_NOTIFICATION_JOB WHERE POLICY_NO = #{policyNo} AND ENABLED = 'Y' ) ROI ON ROI.POLICY_NO=LIPM.LIPM_INSU_NO

SELECT LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_INVT_NO, LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_TRAN_DATE, LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_UNIT_PURPRICE, LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_UNIT_SOLPRICE FROM LIINPR_VIEW@db51 LIINPR_VIEW WHERE LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_INVT_NO = #{invtNo} AND (LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_TRAN_DATE) = ( SELECT MAX(LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_TRAN_DATE) as inpr_tran_date FROM LIINPR_VIEW@db51 LIINPR_VIEW WHERE LIINPR_VIEW.INPR_INVT_NO = #{invtNo} )

SELECT LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_DATE, LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_SPEBK_PURATE, LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_SPEBK_SORATE, LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_CURR_CODE, LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_EXCH_CODE FROM LIEXCH_VIEW@db51 LIEXCH_VIEW WHERE LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_EXCH_CODE = #{exchCode} AND LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_DATE) as exch_date FROM LIEXCH_VIEW@db51 LIEXCH_VIEW WHERE LIEXCH_VIEW.EXCH_EXCH_CODE = #{exchCode} )

SELECT PP.POLICY_NO AS policyNo ,PP.INVT_NO AS invtNo ,PP.INVT_NAME AS invtName ,PP.INVT_RISK_BENE_LEVEL AS invtRiskBeneLevel ,PP.SAFP_NET_AMT as safpNetAmt ,PP.SAFP_NET_UNITS AS safpNetUnits ,PP.SAFP_AVG_PNTDVAL AS safpAvgPntdval ,PP.NET_VALUE_SELL AS netValueSell ,PP.NET_VALUE_DATE AS netValueDate ,PP.EXCH_RATE_BUY AS exchRateBuy ,PP.EXCH_RATE_DATE AS exchRateDate ,PP.CLUP_EXPE_NTD_SUM AS clupExpeNtdSum ,PP.INVT_EXCH_CURR AS invtExchCurr ,( SELECT P.CURRENCY FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY P WHERE P.POLICY_NO = PP.POLICY_NO ) AS insuCurr ,F.RISK_BENE_LEVEL AS riskBeneLevel FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY_PORTFOLIO PP LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.FUND F ON F.FUND_CODE = PP.INVT_NO AND F.PRODUCT_NO = SUBSTRING (PP.POLICY_NO, 0, 3) WHERE PP.POLICY_NO = #{vo.insuNo} AND PP.INVT_NO = #{vo.invtNo}
